title: Lab Closed
message: Tinkerers' Lab will remain closed on June 25 due to maintenance.

title: New Merchandise Launch
message: Grab our all-new TL Connect branded goodies next week!

title: Summer School Starts Monday
message: All registered students must join the orientation on Google Meet.

title: TL Hackathon Registration Open
message: Register now for the 36-hour hackathon with exciting prizes and swag.

title: 3D Printer Maintenance
message: The Prusa MK3 printer will be unavailable for the next 48 hours.

title: TL Connect App Update
message: Please update the app to v2.1.0 to access the latest features.

title: Monthly Feedback Drive
message: Share your feedback and stand a chance to win TL goodies!

title: Workshop: Fusion 360 Crash Course
message: Join the crash course to master basic 3D design in just 2 hours.

title: Electrical Tools Safety Briefing
message: All members must attend the mandatory safety briefing before using electrical stations.

title: Membership Renewal Reminder
message: Renew your TL membership before July 5 to avoid losing access.
